data.title: aurorahorses.com
data.meta_description: Aurora Horses organizes horse riding tours and sleigh rides with Finnhorses in Santa Claus Village, Rovaniemi. Our reliable horses and professional staff guarantee you unforgettable moments in every season. Our tours are suitable for both beginners and more experienced riders. Have fun with Finnhorses!
data.text:
The excursions for the winter season 2024-2025 summer sale -20%!

Make your reservation now and take advantage of our summer campaign:

Promo code: HORSEHOLIDAY

Discount: -20%

Code valid: 15 July 2024 - 31 Aug 2024

Time of the excursion: September 1, 2024 - March 31, 2025

Our lovely Finnish horses warmly welcome you on a relaxing horseback riding excursion, an atmospheric sleigh ride or to get to know us better on a Farm Visit.

You don't need previous horse experience on our tours and they are suitable for both the youngest and seniors in the family.
